en.title: ğŸ”§ Version 1.5.7 (180)
en.text:
1.5.7 (180)

Bug Fixes and Improvements
- Italian added! Thanks once again to the amazing Character Craft community, especially to @Alss on Discord for producing the complete Italian translation! Grazie!
- Spell Card is now more compact.
- Adjusted alignment of Custom Resources for features in some cases.
- Features can now modify the maximum amount of Spell Slots. Just add the modifier to the feature or the desired Toggleable Bonus.
- Fixed minor bugs
